amendment.description: Amendment adds $10 million to a fund established for victims of crimes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "$625 million" and insert, "$635 million" on page 75, line 24.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 395 - 34 (Roll no. 731).
